thread.title: Bush, Clinton display the political divide over gun control
thread.title_full: Bush, Clinton display the political divide over gun control

title: Bush, Clinton display the political divide over gun control
text:
> Florida Bush, Clinton display the political divide over gun control Republican presidential candidate Carly Fiorina speaks at a town hall meetingat the University of South Carolina at Aiken Convocation Center, Friday afternoon, Oct. 2, 2015, in Aiken, S.C.
